tool_description: This endpoint returns 1000+ quotes about life purpose and being motivated.
title: Life Purpose Quotes DB

api_list.name: Quotes
api_list.description: This endpoint returns more than 1000 quotes about life purpose and motivation. It includes the quote, author and source url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://life-purpose-quotes-db.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "life-purpose-quotes-db.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
